## rgbToLAB() function

Converts a [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) to a [ColorLAB](./fast-colors.colorlab.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rgbToLAB(rgb: ColorRGBA64): ColorLAB;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rgb | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) | the rgb color to convert |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorLAB](./fast-colors.colorlab.md)

## Remarks

The alpha channel of the input is ignored
